title: Drawing, Cartoon for Harper Window with Alternate Border Design, Larchmont Yacht Club, Larchmont, NY, 1896–97
title_raw: Cartoon for Harper Window with Alternate Border Design, Larchmont Yacht Club, Larchmont, NY
medium: Graphite, brush and watercolor on pierced tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, recto upper right: Harper window design / #953; upper left: this border; verso left: Miss Morse / for yacht club
description: Design in horizontal rectangle of laurel leaves and garlands crisscrossing in green, with tied bows in pink; framed by chartreuse beaded border and pink brick border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Cartoon for Harper Window with Alternate Border Design, Larchmont Yacht Club, Larchmont, NY, 1896–97. Graphite, brush and watercolor on pierced tracing paper. 
Gift of Alice C. Morse. 2009-6-57
